home.introduction.catchphrase.message: Let everyone know what you are watching and listening to!
home.introduction.catchphrase.description: First phrase that a user reads on our website

home.introduction.button.discord.description: Discord server button -> redirects to Discord invite; {0} will be replaced with 'Discord' -> is a variable

home.examples.playingagame.description: Discord Rich Presence -> Playing a game

home.examples.timestamp.description: Discord Rich Presence -> time left; {0} will be replaced with the current timestamp -> is a variable

home.cards.subheading.message: These cards will show you our main features to help you understand what {0} can do!
home.cards.subheading.description: Features section subheading; {0} will be replaced with 'PreMiD' -> is a variable

home.cards.extensionsystem.description.message: Our extension has its own extensions! Sounds very strange but it allows you to install different presences for your lovely services!

home.cards.mediacontrols.desciption.message: Most of our presences provide support for Media Controls. You can skip & pause tracks while using other applications.

home.cards.tabpriority.description.message: When changing between tabs, our extensions prioritizes the active one.

home.cards.opensource.description.message: You noticed a bug or just want to improve our code? Then you have the opportunity to contribute to our {0} project.
home.cards.opensource.description.description: Open Source card description; {0} will be replaced with 'GitHub' -> is a variable
